sentences: This issue was addressed in a contact group and during informal consultations.
JAPAN highlighted a workshop for CDM Designated National Authorities (DNAs).
The EU proposed recognizing the informal DNA forum established this week, while CHINA said its usefulness can only be assessed at a later stage.
Informal consultations on draft SBI conclusions will be held before the contact group meets on Wednesday.
enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
